messages.subject: how hot is it where ºUº R???
messages.msgSnippet: OHHHHHHHHHHHH LYNDAAAAAA ... say it isn t soooooo, 67* IS our WINTERRRRRRRRR!!!  ughhhhhhhhhh ... YES, YES, we ll be MORE THAN HAPPY to share out 100 + temps
messages.messageBody:
OHHHHHHHHHHHH LYNDAAAAAA ... say it isn't soooooo, 67* IS our
WINTERRRRRRRRR!!! ughhhhhhhhhh ... YES, YES, we'll be MORE THAN HAPPY to
share out 100 + temps AND SUN w/ ºÜº ... yesterday our temp was *officially*
registered @ 109* and today we're expecting 106* BUT FRIDAY we'll be having
a COLD FRONT, it'll ONLY be supposed to be 92*!!!!!!! *but*, it's a DRY
HEAT :{

soooooooo, come on everybody??? how HOT is it where ºÜº R???

Pris ~> who just got a headache from reading those temps :P
WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my cats
have learned how to type ...


----- Original Message -----
From: "Lynda" <lurine@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 05, 2000 12:32 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Weather, was Apologies from Dawn F


>
> Hey, how's about we trade some weather. We never did have a real summer.
> I'll send you some 67 degree days for some 100 degree days down on the
> river.
>
> Lynda
>
> ----------
> > From: Pris <x_t_sipr@...>
> > To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
> > Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Apologies from Dawn F
> > Date: Monday, September 04, 2000 10:50 AM
> >
> :) ... *VERY* big of you to apologize, Dawn F :) I, for one, am quick to
> > forgive <G>
> >
> > Pris ~> who'z handing Dawn F a huge frosty glass of lemonade (we drink
> LOTS
> > of lemonade @ our house on days like this) ... weatherbug now says it's
> > 107*!!! UGHHHHHhh, come on WINTER!!!
> > WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my
> cats
> > have learned how to type ...
